attributes.action: Out with the Coalition and in with Boris
attributes.additional_details: Nick Clegg now wants to tax the people who are successful, small businesses like 'me' to pay the poor but has he stopped at my house to talk to me about how I built my life...does he know or not know that I was once poor?...NO....He did not. Cameron and Clegg, STOP TAKING MONEY OFF THE PEOPLE WHO HAVE MADE THE MONEY AND ARE CONTINUING TO TURNING. DONT TAX THE SUCCESSFUL. TAX THE PEOPLE THAT EVADE TAX, TOUGHEN PUNISHMENT AND ABOVE ALL HARDEN THE BOUNDARIES OF OUR GREAT NATION. WINSTON CHURCHILL WOULD STUB HIS CIGAR OUT IN HIS ASHTRAY AND SEND YOU BACK TO SCHOOL.
